column4: i have a command that I want to make an executable program, essentially, it's in my local /bin directory on a server, ow do I make it so I can run it?
no, a text file that just contains a command
place the file in /usr/local/bin and chmod it -- sudo chmod a+x /usr/local/bin/program_name
quite unlikely -- 764 doesnt lets group or other users execute the file
only the owner of that file will be able to execute it, and that's probably root
